channel.title: IpkiUpdate Thread
channel.description:
Hello, and welcome to my IpkiUpdate thread. In this thread you will see the things I have put my time into.
What I plan to do is to create a full map server like battlescape using deltascapes source. I have reediting most thing such as npc dialogues, new quests such as RFD and Fremennik Isle, Minigames (Pc, removing the rd age armour and puting Exp instead), Npc vs Npc and much much more.
What I have changed so far:
The Fight pit reward is now tokkul depending on how many people you kill 95% barrows Full kalphite queen with 2 forms Added pest control monsters (aggressive aswel) 2 new quest(Fremennik Isle and RFD) Full Npc emotes All npc dialogues changed Full Culinaromancer's Chest Changed shops and shop location Relocated npcs Renamed npcs Re-examine npcs Full dclaw spec with 4 hits Fixed dbow spec and dmace icon Npc Maging/Ranging 90% Fixed Zamorak gs spec
What I have done with my client:
New background Modified Gameframe Inserted new models Flames on client (35% Elite, 25% delta) Added rune berserker shield with full movements Added dragon plate and claws
What I am planning to do in the future:
Make 2 more new quests (Fremennik Trials, Horror from the deep) Create a warriors guild with full models Full mage arena with minigame and full dialogues Better Godwars with saradomin, bandos, zamorak and armadyl.
I will work on this until it is finished, see ya in the mean time...
And here is a pic of my RFD quest, the final fight: [IMG]http://i447.photobucket.com/albums/qq197/doublek0ftw/RFDPics.jpg[/img]
